Articles.Content:
Plz delete.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T18:32:36Z" title="04/25/2015 06:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**
You sure this was ready for release?

> 
> Can you add some pics?

I will in a few hours.

> 
> You sure this was ready for release?

It's released all right. Still in beta testing, but it's stable enough for release.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T14:34:53Z" title="04/25/2015 02:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**

> 
> It's not released per se, I just put a thread here to show that it's stable and working now and also because people will look at it more.

That's not a good idea. A new thread in Releases pushes another released mod off the first page, it's hardly fair to do so if you don't consider your mod released. Let me know whether you want to commit to this as a release or if you'd rather have this thread merged with your WIP thread until it is ready for a proper release.

> 
> That's not a good idea. A new thread in Releases pushes another released mod off the first page, it's hardly fair to do so if you don't consider your mod released. Let me know whether you want to commit to this as a release or if you'd rather have this thread merged with your WIP thread until it is ready for a proper release.

 I'm commited, it's stable now.

Are you sure "stable" is the best way to put it? This is a part pack not a plugin they are inherently stable you'd have to be trying to fail to land any where between does not work and stable. Not to mention you hadn't made any thing yet this is all shadows work he might as well have just started his own release thread.

> 
> Are you sure "stable" is the best way to put it? This is a part pack not a plugin they are inherently stable you'd have to be trying to fail to land any where between does not work and stable. Not to mention you hadn't made any thing yet this is all shadows work he might as well have just started his own release thread.

Yeah, I feel like shadow is doing all the work in this mod too.

> 
> Yeah, I feel like shadow is doing all the work in this mod too.

I agree... but it's still up to Augustus to decide what's right to do...(cough \*hint\*hint\* cough)

Shouldn't you at least give credits to the original mod author from the Apollo Command Module? I know, the license of it says it is not required, but you should at least mention that the stuff is not from you. Don't say now you modified the configs and it would be totally your work now. I totally agree with the others, TheShadow could have just made his own thread, but he's so kind to work for you (sounds not that good, didn't know how to express it otherwise ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) ).

My advise now: Let this thread delete, or merge it together with \*your\* development thread, you can see that it is not ready for a release. Just look at all the posts and see what the peoples wrote, hopefully you will understand what I want to say ...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T18:02:57Z" title="04/25/2015 06:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Kartoffelkuchen**

About your recommended mods section. Could you please not link to my mod because I might add a CARV. I have not implemented a CARV yet and with my sporadic activity who knows how long that would really take, and I'm not comfortable advertising what I'm up to till I actually have some thing to show for it. Also I think your reason for linking to tantares is misleading when you don't have any texture sharing parts yet you should change it to simply say it is a place to get a ATV
